title: History Extra podcast - February 2009 - Part 2
itunes:title: History Extra podcast - February 2009 - Part 2
itunes:subtitle: Sir David Attenborough gives his thoughts on Charles Darwin and the impact of his work, Adrian Desmond explains why he believes a passionate hatred of slavery was one of the driving forces behind Darwin's career.
description:
Sir David Attenborough gives his thoughts on Charles Darwin and the impact of his work, Adrian Desmond explains why he believes a passionate hatred of slavery was one of the driving forces behind Darwin's career.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
